name: homecoming (Sharkpatrol  Heavy Industries)
description:
You are a Mercenary. The War is Over. Collect Your Pay.

Suggested playtime: ~5-10 minutes

This is a dialog-driven adventure game made as a learn-by-doing approach to understanding game design, software development, and the Unity engine. It has a beginning, a middle, and an end.

Besides basing tiles off of a free asset pack from Kenney.nl, everything else has been built from scratch using Unity and its C# API.

Note: The WebGL build of this has smaller text than intended. I doubt I will have time to fix this, if the text is difficult to read, please change the zoom setting in your browser!

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Use/Interact
  • Mouse Movement - target direction
  • Tab - Toggle Inventory
